TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MessagePropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Represents data that is passed locally with a custom message type but not serialized into a SOAP message.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the MessagePropertyAttribute attribute to attach data to the custom message type as it passes through the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system without serializing the data into a SOAP message.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the MessagePropertyAttribute attribute.
[!code-cs[messagepropertyattribute#0](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.servicemodel.me_2_1.cs)] [!code-vb[messagepropertyattribute#0](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.servicemodel.me_2_1.vb)]
